title: PBE Error 500
body: I see other people with this problem and I have tried the solutions in their comments but none seem to be working for me. I got Cyberghost but that didnt seem to help and neither did clearing my cache. Please help me. I'm just trying to signup for PBE

replies.body: having the same issue, found a fix yet?

I've been seeing a few reports on this as well, and I'm not sure what the deal is.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and grab logs to investigate further.  If we can't find a solution right away, we can get a better idea of the situation.  Hit us up!
